price: Dájúdájú A ṣẹ́ ẹ kù (tí A fi ṣe) àmì. Ǹjẹ́ olùrántí wà báyìí bí?
arabic: وَلَقَد تَّرَكۡنَٰهَآ ءَايَةٗ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad taraknāhā āyatan fahal min muddakirin
